name: @valcome/ng-google-gtag
description: Angular library to simply integrate gtag

scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade npm version" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && cd ../../dist/ng-google-gtag && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && cd ../../dist/ng-google-gtag && npm publish

author: Valcome Analytics
